infotexts.entitydescription.cyberbodyassistant: An artificial body made entirely from metal. It seems to emanate an aura of incompetence.
infotexts.entitydescription.cyberbodycaptain: An artificial body made entirely from metal. Adorned with an admiral's crest, a strange sense of authority is commanded by this vacant shell.
infotexts.entitydescription.cyberbodymedic: An artificial body made entirely from metal. A sickly aroma of blood is present, thinly veiled by sterile chemicals.
infotexts.entitydescription.cyberbodymechanic: An artificial body made entirely from metal. The faint sound of gears grinding can be heard from within.
infotexts.entitydescription.cyberbodysecurity: An artificial body made entirely from metal. Sporadic shockwaves shoot through the cold, hard, steel.
infotexts.entitydescription.cyberbodyengineer: An artificial body made entirely from metal. You can feel sharp jolts of electicity running through it.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.ntt_unscrewed: The metal plating has been unfastened, leaving the brain exposed.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.ntt_cyberskull: The skull is made of metal and electronics.
infotexts.afflictiondescription.ntt_cyberchest: A synthetic vessel composed of metal and electronics. Not quite a machine, but no longer a man.
infotexts.entitydescription.brainjar: A container to hold brain transplants indefinitely
infotexts.entitydescription.cyberskull: A cybernetic skull designed to house a human brain.
